group_1.textRight: Ooh, look here!
This place is just perfect, right?
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]A whole section for outdoor gear.

group_1.textLeft: It's not like we're going mountain climbing@or anything...
I doubt we need special gear for the rally.

group_1.textRight: No no no, we're aiming for first place.
Our preparations must be perfect!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* If you say so. Right, Masara?

group_1.textRight: Mm...@Yes, I suppose.

group_1.textLeft: You don't really need serious hiking shoes.
Do you have regular sneakers?

group_1.textRight: No, I don't.

group_1.textLeft: Oh... [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301601:motion_0][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Okay then, what should we do...

group_1.textRight: What kinds are there? Will you help me@choose?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you're going to buy some sneakers?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Since we're here.

group_1.textLeft: Okay... [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Yeah! Let's pick you some out.

group_1.textRight: All right.
Were the hiking shoes over here?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, those might be a little too hardcore.
Don't you think it's better to get you some@shoes you might wear every day?

group_1.textRight: Mm...I suppose so.

group_1.textLeft: Oh! How about this pair? [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]They're navy!@I think they'd really suit you.

group_1.textRight: Let's go with those, then.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?! Uh, you don't have an opinion?

group_1.textRight: Not really. I don't have a favorite color@or anything like that.

group_1.textLeft: But...are you sure you want me to choose?

group_1.textRight: It's fine. I'll get what you like.

group_1.textLeft: ...@[wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]You sure...?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: (Can she just not be bothered? Or is she@being cute? I can't tell...)

group_1.narration: ―Kokoro―@Here it is!@We can buy a bento box here!
―Kokoro―@This paper bento box folds flat@after you finish eating!
―Kokoro―@Right? We have to keep our@packs as light as possible.

group_1.textRight: Hey, what about this?

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Bear spray! It comes recommended by@American park rangers.

group_1.textLeft: Mitama, what mountain are you planning@to have us climb?

group_1.textRight: Oh... So is that a no?

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, you don't seem to have@any equipment.
Are you gonna be okay? You don't need@rain gear or anything like that?

group_1.textRight: Now, who was it that invited you along to@this event?
It was me, wasn't it?
It's not wise to underestimate me. You know,@back in the day...
I was known as a "mountain girl"! Everyone@said I was as resourceful as a fly!

group_1.textLeft: A fly, huh… I don't even think that's a real@phrase…
It's nowhere near right.

group_1.textRight: Goodness! You two are a tough crowd.
Now, is there anything you forgot to buy?

group_1.textLeft: Um, let's see. We bought these...and this@already...

group_1.textRight: What about the thing you mentioned before?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, that...[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]
